name: AutoAnihilation
description:
Delve amidst a corrupted world where you yourself are the only mechanic prepared to face it.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CAR!

UPGRADE YOUR WEAPONS!

FIGHT WAVES OF SMART ENEMIES!

DEFEAT THE WORLD LEADER OR DIE TRYING.

Disclaimer: This product is just a demo of the full game, car and weapon customization are locked and only a single wave of enemies must be stopped.
